issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Pass schema including all materialized fields to catch CSV edge cases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8630](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8630). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see discussion here https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7033#discussion_r416941674

Fields filtered but not projected will revert to their inferred type, whatever their dataset's schema may be. This can cause validated filters to fail due to type disagreements
